diff_act: 2.ensure the user has the correct role association
3.add them to the laboratory information system

regen.absent_element: verification of user role association before adding a new user
regen.new_specification: The system shall verify that the user has the correct role association before adding them to the laboratory information system

regen.absent_element: designation of user's role when verifying user status
regen.new_specification: The system shall verify the user's role association when attempting to add a new user to the system.

regen.absent_element: designation of roles for new users in the database
regen.new_specification: The system shall associate the user's role with their division when saving user information to the database.

label: The system shall save the user info to the database with specified roles associated with divisions for the newly created/added user.
absence: action of associating the new user with the divisions
